name: Monday.com Ltd.
description: Monday.com Ltd. is a leading work operating system (Work OS) that empowers teams to run projects and workflows with ease. Founded in 2012 by Roy Mann and Eran Zinman, the company has transformed the way organizations collaborate and manage their work. With its visually intuitive platform, Monday.com allows teams to customize their workflows, automate repetitive tasks, and track progress in real-time. The platform is designed to enhance productivity and transparency across various industries, making it suitable for teams of all sizes. Monday.com provides a variety of templates and automation tools that help organizations streamline processes, thus fostering a culture of efficiency and collaboration. The company has rapidly gained traction among businesses worldwide, serving over 152,000 customers in more than 200 industries. Monday.com’s mission is to create a world where organizations can work seamlessly and achieve their goals through efficient collaboration, making it a vital tool for modern businesses. As the demand for remote work solutions continues to grow, Monday.com remains at the forefront of innovation in the collaboration software space, consistently rolling out new features to meet evolving customer needs.

seo.meta_title: Monday.com | Work Operating System for Teams
seo.meta_description: Discover Monday.com, a leading Work OS that helps teams manage their projects and workflows effectively. Transform the way your organization collaborates.

faq.question: What is Monday.com used for?
faq.answer: Monday.com is used for project management, task tracking, and team collaboration.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Monday.com?
faq.answer: Roy Mann is the CEO of Monday.com Ltd.

faq.question: Where is Monday.com headquartered?
faq.answer: Monday.com is headquartered in Tel Aviv, Israel.

faq.question: What are the main features of Monday.com?
faq.answer: Main features include customizable workflows, automation tools, real-time tracking, and various project management templates.
